name: Chad Lavallee's Gremlin Kickball [Incomplete]
description:
This is a platforming game I created for Chad Lavallee and was demo'd at Gottacon. Unfortunately, the game has quite a bit of extra assets attached to the texture sheets which pads the game's overall file size. I can't be bothered to make it more lean. 

Anyway, check it out with your XBox Controller! Hold R to restart.

The main reason development has ceased is because the art assets make the file sizes much too large,  and development was getting tedious and buggy (bad compiles) I've since moved on to smaller games using Game Maker Studio.
